div.head: Making silver run
div.ab: If it is for a large work, arsenic & tartar, pulverized & thrown on the melted silver, makes it run If it is and suffices. But for fine work, one needs some aes ustum, filings of latten of thin copper, u antimony, sublimate, finely pulverized. This From this gets made a mass that does not sour. If the s plaster is good, one ought not to add crocum for silver, but one puts more feather alum. It needs also some melted common salt & some saltpeter with the aforesaid drugs: arsenic, tartar, aes ustum, copper filings, antimony &c.
